client_logic.text:
I need 5 craftball to capture monsters. If you help me, I give you some plant.

Yes I have it
I don't have it
I wait you with the 5 craftball

Do you have the 5 craftball for me?

Yes I have it
Now talk to the reaper, it give you the plant

What do you want?

The bandit have say to talk to you
Exactly, you have finish the quest for him
